entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:23 a.m. CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
